# label

**Type Property**

A key for a corresponding value that represents a textual label for a dragging item, for example, a file name.

## Declaration

```swift
static let label: NSDraggingItem.ImageComponentKey
```

## Constants

- **icon**: A key for a corresponding value that is a dragging item’s image.

items.description: A key for a corresponding value that is a dragging item’s image.
items.name: icon

title: label
